title: Inside Training : Watch us prepare for Brentford
body_text:
We’re back in Premier League action this weekend with a trip to Brentford following the international break.
Take a look at how our lads got on in the latest session at London Colney as we get ready to face the Bees.
We’ll be looking to pick up where we left off after a 3-1 win against Burnley that left us third in the Premier League prior to the international break.
Thomas Frank’s side will be hoping to show a response to their 3-0 loss at Liverpool in early November.
Press play on the video above to watch all the action from Inside Training.
